price: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, Allah Yã taimake ku a Badar, alhãli kuwa kunã mafiya rauni, sabõda haka ku bi Allah da taƙawa tsammãninku, kuna gõdẽwa.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ نَصَرَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِبَدۡرٖ وَأَنتُمۡ أَذِلَّةٞۖ فَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad naṣarakumu al-lahu bibadrin wa-antum adhillatun fa-ittaqū al-laha laʿallakum tashkurūna
